reviewText:
This is a good training video for those who want to learn basic
skills and experience basic martial arts in time

I'm a true beginner, and this is a bit more advanced.  You need some instruction to relate to this DVD. However it is amazing what you can learn down the road, and it makes you appreciate how dedicated and involved in Karate, Reeves is.  It does inspire me to learn more.  Karate is very disciplined, and gives you great focus and develops good concentration. It is truly a great art.

i have 40 years experince ranked 8thdan kyoshi ive think i seem them all you willbenifit from this  dvd.if your a beginner or 4th thru 3 kyu you can still benifit.every thing comes from basic.if your just getting into isshin ryu or switchingover  from another system this first dvd ,will get you on the right path.thanks kyoshi phtaylor matsubayashiryu okinawa tomariryu amen.
I was dissappoointed with this dvd.  There are so many different types of martial arts.  If you are getting this to supplement something you are currently taking, make sure it is the correct form.
